import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'], }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded: boolean = false; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } closeMenu() { this.isExpanded = false; } isLoggedIn(): boolean { return this.authService.isLoggedIn(); } getUsername(): string { return this.authService.getUsername(); } logout() { this.closeMenu(); this.authService.logout(); } }
